## Interactive Map

This map was created on `r format(Sys.Date(), "%B %d, %Y")`.
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=-122.4194, lat=37.7749, 
             popup="San Francisco, CA") %>%
  addMarkers(lng=-0.1276, lat=51.5074,
             popup="London, UK") %>%
  addMarkers(lng=139.6917, lat=35.6895,
             popup="Tokyo, Japan")
```
